name: A Modern Adventure
description:
Do you like insane enemies, out-of-place artifacts, and waffles? If so, THIS IS THE GAME FOR YOU! A portal has opened up and taken you and some of the stuff from your time (including YOUR waffles...) to a distant fantasy land. It's your job to delve into the dungeon, fight the monsters inside, and get your items back (especially the waffles)!

This game was created for the first Completion Jam hosted by Deynum.
